a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Opinions of young people on the threats of climate change, 2021
Share of young people in each surveyed country that responded "yes" to each statement about climate change.
1,000 young people, aged 16 to 25 years old, were surveyed in each country.

g.text: "Family security is threatened""Family security is threatened"
"Less opportunity than their parents""Less opportunity than their parents"
"Hesitant to have children""Hesitant to have children"
"People have failed to take care of the planet""People have failed to take care of the planet"

text.tspan: Data source: Hickman et al. (2021). Climate anxiety in children and young people and their beliefs about government responses to
